TextView.android:text:
The rules for the game are as follows:

 1. A random color will be generated and you will have to use the RED, GREEN and BLUE inputs to get as close as possible to the generated color

 2. All color values are from 0 to 255

 3. You are allowed 3 tries and 1 guess per round

 4. Each try will change your screen background to see how close of a match you are to the winning color

 5. Once you think you've got it close enough, then you can use your guess

 6. Each color provides 10 points for a perfect match

 7. If your answer is not perfect then you will be awarded points based on how close you were in 10% increments

 8. Game ends when the player reaches 150 points
